sentences: Kose mühin kostab nüüd juba lähemalt.
Seda asja, küsimust tuleb lähemalt uurida, selgitada.
context: The Estonian adverb 'lähemalt' means 'more closely', 'in more detail', or 'more specifically'. It is the comparative form of lähedalt (from lähedane, meaning near/close). The word indicates examining something with greater proximity or attention to detail. It's used when you want someone to look at something more carefully, explain something in more depth, or get closer to see something better.
